experiences: Designed and implemented a data pipeline for automating 3D LiDAR analysis, ensuring ADA compliance checks for curb ramps. Developed algorithms for data cleaning, feature extraction, and compliance validation using Python and Cloud Compare. Integrated a Tkinter-based interface to streamline the upload, point selection, and slope analysis, improving accessibility audits and reducing processing time.

Engineered advanced data visualizations and analytics on a big data and AI platform, creating interactive dashboards using React.js, D3.js, and Chart.js for data-driven decision-making. Managed SQL databases and integrated KPIs using JSON-based configurations for dynamic data ingestion, enabling real-time analytics and seamless integration with interactive dashboards. Assisted in deploying scalable applications with Amazon S3 and Kubernetes, enhancing system performance and user engagement.

Developed an Employee Portal using .NET Framework, ASP.NET, and C#, focusing on database creation for user authentication, role-based access control, and data management. Designed secure and efficient database structures to enhance internal communication and streamline workflows, while gaining proficiency in full-stack development with .NET technologies.
